abstract: A move by China in a possible mining deal could sharply increase the price of what would be one of the biggest mergers in corporate history.
snippet: A move by China in a possible mining deal could sharply increase the price of what would be one of the biggest mergers in corporate history.
lead_paragraph: BEIJING  The world’s biggest mining company, BHP Billiton, must decide by Wednesday whether it will proceed with a bid for a rival, the Rio Tinto Group, after China intervened with a strategic investment that could sharply increase the price of what would be one of the biggest mergers in corporate history.

headline.main: BHP Weighs Options in Rio Tinto Bid
headline.print_headline: Chinese Investment Complicates BHP’s Plans for Rio Tinto Bid
